definitions.text: a curved shape in the vertical plane that spans an opening
a curved bony structure supporting or enclosing organs (especially the inner sides of the feet)
a passageway under a curved masonry construction
examples: they built a triumphal arch to memorialize their victory

definitions.text: (architecture) a masonry construction (usually curved) for spanning an opening and supporting the weight above it
(used of behavior or attitude) characteristic of those who treat others with condescension

examples: teasing and worrying with impish laughter
